p.sub: Answering these questions while actively reading the text is good practice for answering the kinds of questions that might appear on the exams. Your answers may also shape the discussions in class.

open_response.prompt: Question: What are the possible attachment sites for a new nucleotide to the ends of an existing polynucleotide? Why doesnâ€™t it matter if the primer for DNA synthesis is either a segment of RNA or DNA?
